articles.author: Kevin Liptak
articles.title: Trump announces novel plan to send weapons to Ukraine and gives Russia new deadline to make peace - CNN
articles.description: When President Donald Trump won last year’s election, European officials quickly began discussing how to sustain US weapons shipments to Ukraine under a leader who had vowed to pull back American support.

articles.title: Trump agrees to send weapons to Ukraine - Politico
articles.description: The president said European allies will pay for the systems, which will come from American stockpiles.
articles.content: Trump made the announcement during an Oval Office meeting with NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte, who heralded the presidents decision as really big and further evidence that Europe is stepping up. … [+2460 chars]

articles.author: Anna Cooban
articles.title: EU warns that its trade with the US could be effectively wiped out if Trump follows through on his threat - CNN
articles.description: The European Union has warned that its trade with the United States could be effectively wiped out if Washington makes good on its threat to slap a 30% tariff on goods imported from the bloc.
articles.content:
